description: Number of proper covers of an n-set.
references: A. J. Macula, Covers of a finite set, Math. Mag., 67 (1994), 141-144.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..11
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Proper Cover.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: One more term from _Emeric Deutsch_, Aug 01 2005
